import React from "react"; import "./Resume.css"; import Aos from "aos"; import "aos/dist/aos.css"; import { useEffect } from "react"; const Resume = () => { useEffect(() => { Aos.init({ duration: 2000 }); }, []); return ( <>

Resume

Summary

  • Abhishek Yadav

    Aspiring and creative Full-Stack Web Developer with in expertise in MERN. Self motivated and curious to develop user-centric products. Looking forward to working in a driven company where I can implement my skills and grow with the growth of the organization.

    • Kanpur, India
    • +91- 6386653849
    • abhishekyadav17012000@gmail.com

Education

  • BACHELOR OF TECHNOLOGY IN MECHANICAL ENGINEERING

    Aug 2018 - Sep 2022

    {" "} Institute of Engieering and Technology, Dr. Rammanohar Lohia Avadh University, Ayodhya

); }; export default Resume;
